metadata.title: CVE-2021-36584 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC 1.0.1. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function gp_rtp_builder_do_tx3g function in ietf/rtp_pck_3gpp.c, as demonstrated by MP4Box. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
